bill_title: repeal provisions regarding river basin natural resource districts

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to repeal provisions regarding river basin natural resource districts. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That § 46A-19-1 be repealed. 46A-19-1. Pursuant to §§ 46A-19-3 to 46A-19-11, inclusive, the state is divided into nine river basin natural resource districts. Each district is a political subdivision of the state. Section 2. That §§ 46A-19-2 to 46-A-19-17, inclusive, be repealed. 100 copies were printed on recycled paper by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.167 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in Senate and referred to
